property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 standard wound to a target. Draw a card. This attack cannot deal extra wounds.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GETENEMY], [DEALONLY, 1, "Standard", TARGET], [DRAW, 1]

property.name: Description
property.value: Discard: cure up to 2 standard wounds on a target.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 weight

property.name: Use_Script
property.value: [GETCHARACTER], [DISCARD, THIS], [CURE, TARGET, [EQUAL, [TYPE, CHECKED], "Standard"]], [CURE, TARGET, [EQUAL, [TYPE, CHECKED], "Standard"]]

property.name: Description
property.value: Discard: cure 1 wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 weight

property.name: Use_Script
property.value: [GETCHARACTER], [DISCARD, THIS], [CURE, TARGET, TRUE]

property.name: Description
property.value: Draw 1 card. Return 1 item from the discard pile into play.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [DRAW, 1], [GETTARGET, [EQUAL, "Item", [TYPE, CHECKED]], BACKPACK], [PLAY, TARGET]

property.name: Description
property.value: You have 2 more health.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 weight

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GAINHEALTH, 2]

property.name: Description
property.value: If you are at 0 or less health, cure 2 standard wounds and 1 wound of any kind. Otherwise, cure 2 standard wounds.

property.name: Description
property.value: Discard: convert 1 of your normal, non-standard wounds to a standard wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 weight

property.name: Use_Script
property.value: [DISCARD, THIS], [REMOVENORMALWOUNDS, [CHOOSENORMALWOUND, "Which wound are you converting?", [OWNER, THIS], [NOT, [EQUAL, TYPE, "Standard"]]]], [TAKEWOUNDS, 1, "Standard"]

property.name: Description
property.value: Discard, discard a Poultice item: convert 1 of your injuries to its original normal wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 weight

property.name: Description
property.value: 1 mana: Treat an attack as a spell instead (gaining all bonuses for being so).

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 weight

property.name: Description
property.value: When you are the target of an attack or spell, all wounds dealt to you are unpreventable.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 standard

property.name: Description
property.value: At the start of your turn, lose 1 stamina. You may discard 2 cards from your hand to convert Staggered to a normal standard wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 standard

property.name: Description
property.value: Draw 3 cards.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [DRAW, 3]

property.name: Description
property.value: Your next attack deals 1 additional frost wound.

property.name: Description
property.value: Your next attack deals 1 additional burn wound.

property.name: Description
property.value: You may reveal this card at the start of your turn. If you do, discard this card and ignore all injuries on you for this turn.

property.name: Description
property.value: Play an attack from your discard.

property.name: Description
property.value: Gain 2 stamina. At the start of your next turn, lose 1 stamina. You may not retreat next turn.

property.name: Description
property.value: Draw a random attack card from your deck. You may play it immediately, if able.

property.name: Description
property.value: Convert an injury to its original normal wound.
